name: FartFacts
0:
”Alexa, open fart facts”
”Alexa, start fart facts”
”Alexa, launch fart facts”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fart facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In Fart Facts you'll hear funny facts about farts! This is a simple but fun game to play with your friends! We update our games frequently with new and funny features!

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! 
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
